Reviews.Title: GE 45256 indoor/outdoor Digital Color Camera
Reviews.Author: L Nadine McDonald
Reviews.Content: We love this!  We have it set to watch our drive-way......There are a lot of  break-ins in our area....One  emptied  our gasoline tank but that is  before we installed the camera...........

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: Jcmak
Reviews.Content: I got  Motorola before and I returned because was horrible, so I ordered this better because I already had the monitor and one camera for my kids.
